hero.subtitle: Bank statements, invoices, HMRC reports, tax deadlines, secure vault and AI assistant — all in one platform built for UK individuals and businesses.

features.title: Everything You Need in One Place
features.subtitle: 30+ powerful modules designed specifically for UK personal and business finance.

featureCards.bankStatementsDesc: Upload CSV, PDF or Excel statements. AI categorises every transaction and maps it to your accounts automatically.
featureCards.invoicesDesc: Create professional invoices, track payments and overdue amounts. Scan paper invoices with AI document processing.
featureCards.billsSubscriptionsDesc: Manage recurring bills, set due-date reminders and track spending by provider. Never miss a payment.
featureCards.hmrcTaxReportsDesc: Generate SA103, CT600 and tax summaries with automatic HMRC box mapping. Export to PDF in one click.
featureCards.financialProjectionsDesc: Cash flow forecasting, budget tracking, savings goals and debt payoff plans. See your financial future.
featureCards.transfersDesc: Track inter-account transfers and reconcile balances across all your bank accounts and entities.
featureCards.aiCategorisationDesc: Deterministic rules, pattern matching, AI classification and auto-learning. 90%+ accuracy across all UK banks.
featureCards.aiAssistantDesc: Context-aware AI that understands your financial data. Ask about spending, tax obligations, or get advice in plain English.
featureCards.healthScoreDesc: Real-time score based on 6 components: bills paid, categorisation, savings rate, budgets, actions completed, and data freshness.
featureCards.taxTimelineDesc: Visual calendar of every UK tax deadline. Corporation Tax, Self Assessment, VAT, PAYE — never miss a filing date.
featureCards.companiesHouseDesc: File confirmation statements, change registered addresses and view officers. Direct Companies House API integration.
featureCards.openBankingDesc: Connect your UK bank accounts securely. Transactions sync automatically 3x daily. Full 24-month history on first connect.
featureCards.idVerificationDesc: Government-certified document scanning and biometric face matching. Verify yourself or your clients. Stay GDPR compliant.
featureCards.accountingAcademyDesc: AAT & ACCA exam practice with timed tests, study mode, AI tutor, and a visual career roadmap from Level 2 to Level 6.
featureCards.relocationHubDesc: AI-powered guide for newcomers to the UK. Visa advice, NI numbers, bank accounts, GP registration — fully OISC compliant.
featureCards.marketplaceDesc: Professional accounting, tax filing, and bookkeeping services. Browse packages, compare prices, and track your orders.
featureCards.financialLearningDesc: Built-in guides on UK tax, self-assessment, VAT registration, company accounts and personal finance.
featureCards.multiEntityDesc: Manage personal finances alongside multiple Ltd companies, CICs or sole-trader businesses — all in one account.
featureCards.documentStorageDesc: Upload and organise financial documents. Full-text search, entity linking and secure cloud storage.
featureCards.ukLifeEventsDesc: Track life milestones — buying a home, marriage, starting a business. Personalised financial checklists.
featureCards.pwaDesc: Install HomeLedger on your phone or desktop. Works offline, instant access from your home screen — no app store needed.
featureCards.accountantPortalDesc: Share financial data with your accountant via secure, read-only links. No password sharing — they see exactly what you allow.
featureCards.propertyIntelligenceDesc: 9 purchase modes compared — personal, joint tenants, Ltd company, trust, charity, pension, shared ownership, right to buy. Full tax implications (SDLT, IHT, CGT, Corp Tax, ATED) sourced from GOV.UK.
featureCards.sdltCalculatorDesc: Stamp Duty Land Tax calculator with 6 buyer types — first-time, additional property, company, non-resident, corporate. Official 2025/26 tax bands with detailed breakdowns.
featureCards.mortgageSimulatorDesc: Estimate your mortgage chances based on age, employment type, income, debts, credit score, deposit, and property type. Probability gauge, stress test, red flags, and lender suitability.
featureCards.purchasePlannerDesc: AI-powered plan using your real financial data. Reads accounts, entities, transactions, debts, and savings goals. Cross-entity strategy for personal vs company purchase.
featureCards.investmentProjectionsDesc: Compound interest engine for ISAs, stocks, pensions, bonds, company retained profits. Tracks dividends, reinvestment, and monthly contributions towards your deposit target.
featureCards.savingsPlanDesc: Personalised savings plan based on your real income and expenses. Scenario modelling — see how expense cuts or partner income changes your timeline to deposit.
featureCards.mortgageAffordabilityDesc: Calculate max borrowing at 4x and 4.5x salary. Monthly payment breakdown with total interest paid over the mortgage term.
featureCards.creditScoreHubDesc: Understand UK credit scoring across Experian, Equifax and TransUnion. Score bands, impact factors, 8 improvement tips with timelines, and Experian API integration info.
featureCards.smartCategoriesDesc: Custom categories with HMRC tax-box mapping. AI suggests the right category for every transaction.
featureCards.captureClassifyDesc: Scan receipts and documents from your phone. AI extracts, categorises, and files everything automatically.
featureCards.govApisDesc: Connect to Companies House and HMRC. View company profiles, filing history, tax obligations and submit returns.
featureCards.secureVaultDesc: Store passwords, API keys and credentials with AES-256-GCM encryption. Bank-grade security for all your secrets.

business.title: Run Your Business Finances with Confidence
business.description: Whether you're a sole trader, limited company director, or running multiple businesses — HomeLedger gives you the tools to manage everything in one place.
business.feature2: HMRC-ready tax reports (SA103, CT600) with auto box mapping
business.feature5: Accountant portal with read-only secure access
business.feature6: Tax timeline with automatic deadline alerts

property.title: Plan Your Property Purchase with AI-Powered Intelligence
property.description: From first-time buyers to seasoned investors — our suite of property tools analyses your real financial data, projects investment growth with compound interest, and maps cross-entity strategies for the smartest route to homeownership.
property.feature1: 9 purchase modes compared — personal, joint, Ltd company, trust, charity, pension, shared ownership, right to buy
property.feature2: SDLT Calculator with 6 buyer types and official 2025/26 GOV.UK tax bands
property.feature3: Mortgage Approval Simulator — age, employment, income, debts, credit score, deposit analysis
property.feature4: AI Purchase Planner — reads your real accounts, entities, transactions and savings goals
property.feature5: Compound interest projections — ISAs, stocks, pensions, bonds, company retained profits
property.feature6: Cross-entity strategy — salary vs dividends, SPV purchase, director's loan, tax optimisation
property.feature7: Personalised savings plan with milestones and timeline to your deposit target
property.feature8: Credit Score Hub — Experian, Equifax, TransUnion scoring explained with improvement tips

howItWorks.title: Up and Running in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to take control of your finances
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up in under a minute. Choose your plan with a 7-day free trial. Add your personal profile or business entities.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Import bank statements, scan invoices and receipts, or connect to HMRC & Companies House directly.
howItWorks.step3Desc: AI categorises everything, generates tax reports, tracks deadlines and gives you a clear financial picture.

testimonials.title: Trusted by UK Households & Businesses
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from real HomeLedger users across the United Kingdom
testimonials.quote1: HomeLedger saved me hours every month. The AI categorisation is incredibly accurate and HMRC reports are generated in seconds.
testimonials.quote2: Managing multiple entities used to be a nightmare. Now everything is in one place — invoices, tax reports, bank statements.
testimonials.quote3: The accountant portal is a game-changer. I can view all my clients' data without them sharing passwords. Brilliant.

accountants.title: Your Clients' Finances, One Click Away
accountants.description: HomeLedger's accountant portal lets you view your clients' financial data with secure, read-only access. No password sharing, no data exports — just real-time visibility.
accountants.feature1: Dedicated accountant dashboard with multi-client view
accountants.feature2: Secure, read-only access — no password sharing needed
accountants.feature3: View statements, invoices, tax reports, and categories
accountants.feature5: Manage access per client — revoke anytime

idv.title: Identity Verification
idv.subtitle: Simple, Transparent Verification Pricing
idv.noHiddenFees: No hidden fees. No subscription. Pay once, verify as needed.
idv.noAccountNeeded: No account needed — purchase, send the link, get results. It's that simple.
idv.heroDesc1: Identity Document Verification (IDV) is a certified digital process that confirms a person is who they claim to be. It combines document scanning (passport, driving licence, BRP) with biometric facial matching — all from a smartphone.
idv.heroDesc2: The person simply opens a secure link on their phone, takes a photo of their ID document, then takes a selfie. Our AI compares the face on the document with the live selfie in seconds. The result is a government-grade certified report delivered straight to your inbox.
idv.lawDesc: The UK government requires identity verification in multiple scenarios. Failure to comply can result in unlimited fines, criminal prosecution, and loss of your licence to operate. Every business, landlord, and professional in the UK must comply.
idv.law1Desc: Every UK employer MUST verify the identity and right to work of all employees before their first day. Penalties: up to £60,000 per illegal worker and criminal prosecution.
idv.law2Desc: All landlords in England MUST check that tenants have the right to rent in the UK. This includes verifying passports, BRPs, or share codes before signing any tenancy agreement.
idv.law3Desc: Banks, accountants, estate agents, and regulated firms MUST verify customer identity under Anti-Money Laundering regulations. Required by the FCA and enforced by HMRC.
idv.law4Desc: Schools, nurseries, care homes and anyone working with children or vulnerable adults MUST undergo identity verification as part of DBS (formerly CRB) checks.
idv.law5Desc: Businesses holding a Sponsor Licence MUST maintain records of identity checks for all sponsored workers. UKVI audits can revoke your licence if records are missing.
idv.law6Desc: Organisations handling personal data may need to verify identity before granting Subject Access Requests. Proper IDV ensures GDPR compliance and data protection.
idv.complianceDesc: Since April 2022, the Home Office requires all Right to Work and Right to Rent checks to use a certified Identity Document Validation Technology (IDVT) provider. Manual checks of physical documents are no longer sufficient for most document types. HomeLedger uses Yoti, a UK-government certified IDVT provider.
idv.whoSubtitle: Almost every business and professional in the UK. Here are the most common use cases.
idv.who1Desc: Verify Right to Work for every new hire. From startups to large corporates — it's a legal requirement before the employee's first day.
idv.who2Desc: Right to Rent checks before signing tenancy agreements. Applies to all residential lettings in England.
idv.who3Desc: Client onboarding KYC/AML checks. Required under Money Laundering Regulations for all regulated firms.
idv.who4Desc: Client verification for conveyancing, litigation, and corporate transactions. SRA requires robust ID checks.
idv.who5Desc: Document verification for visa applications, settled status, and naturalisation. Share certified results with the Home Office.
idv.who6Desc: Bulk verification for temporary and permanent placements. Process hundreds of checks efficiently with our Business Pack.
idv.processTitle: How It Works — Step by Step
idv.processSubtitle: The entire process takes less than 90 seconds. No apps to download, no accounts to create.
idv.process1Desc: Choose Single, Business or Enterprise. Pay securely via Stripe. You receive unique verification links instantly.
idv.process2Desc: Share the secure verification link via email, WhatsApp, or text. The person to be verified opens it on their phone.
idv.process3Desc: They photograph their ID document (passport, driving licence, or BRP) and take a live selfie for biometric matching.
idv.process4Desc: AI verifies the document and matches the face. You receive a certified result by email within seconds.
idv.pricingSubtitle: No hidden fees. No subscription. Pay once, verify as needed.
idv.noAccountSimple: No account needed — purchase, send the link, get results. It's that simple.

pricing.title: Simple, Honest Pricing
pricing.subtitle: All plans include a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime. No surprises.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers.
faq.a1: Yes! All plans include a 7-day free trial with full access. After the trial, billing starts automatically. You can cancel anytime from your Settings page.
faq.a2: Absolutely. All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest. Vault entries use AES-256-GCM encryption. We never share your data with third parties.
faq.a3: Yes. HomeLedger supports unlimited entities — personal accounts, limited companies, CICs, sole-trader businesses — all from one login.
faq.a4: Yes. We generate SA103 (Self Assessment), CT600 (Corporation Tax), and detailed tax summaries with automatic box mapping. Export to PDF anytime.
faq.q5: Can my accountant access my data?
faq.a5: Yes. Invite your accountant via email. They get a dedicated dashboard to view your data with read-only permissions — no credential sharing needed.
faq.q6: What file formats do you support?
faq.a6: We accept CSV, PDF, Excel (.xlsx), and image files (JPG, PNG) for bank statements, invoices, and documents. Our AI processes them all.
faq.q7: Can I install HomeLedger as a desktop app?
faq.a7: Yes! HomeLedger is a Progressive Web App (PWA). Click "Install" in your browser to add it to your desktop or mobile home screen.
faq.a8: Our Property section includes: 9 purchase mode comparisons, SDLT calculator, Mortgage Approval Simulator, AI Purchase Planner with real data, compound interest investment projections, cross-entity strategy, savings plan generator, and a Credit Score Hub — all sourced from GOV.UK.
faq.q9: Can it help me plan a property purchase?
faq.a9: Yes! The Property Purchase Planner reads your real financial data to calculate a Mortgage Readiness Score, project your savings timeline, and suggest smart strategies like dividend extraction or ISA optimisation.
faq.q10: How does the AI Assistant work?
faq.a10: Our AI understands the context of the page you're on. Ask it about your statements, tax obligations, or spending patterns and it gives personalised answers.
faq.a11: A built-in exam practice platform for AAT (Levels 2–4) and ACCA (Levels 5–6). Features timed exams, study mode with explanations, an AI tutor, and a visual career roadmap.
faq.q12: Do you offer relocation support for newcomers?
faq.a12: Yes! Our UK Relocation Hub is an AI-powered guide that helps newcomers with visa advice, National Insurance numbers, opening bank accounts, GP registration, council tax, and more.
